text: John Cena Tweets About ‘ Messing Around ’ Amid Nikki Bella Reconciliation Rumors! Sounds like John Cena is very much ready to be back with former Nikki Bella! On Monday, the pro wrestler went on Twitter to share a message about wanting to finally “ start messing around ” with someone, and we can only imagine he ’ s talking about the Total Bellas star amid their supposed reconciliation. Related : Nikki Is Holding Onto Her Wedding Dress … Just In Case! See his sexy tweet ( below ) : stop messing around, and start messing around.
